recipe.title: Culantro Pesto
ingredients: 1/2 teaspoon salt, plus more to taste
1/3 cup grated Parmesan and/or Pecorino Romano cheese
instructions: Combine the garlic, salt, pepper to taste, and pine nuts in a food processor. Add the oil and culantro and process until smooth. Add the cheese and pulse to incorporate. Store in an airtight container until ready to use, up to 1 week in the refrigerator or 4 months in the freezer.
